law.catch_line: Denial of application for registration as pharmacy technician -- Hearing.

text.section:
The board may deny an application for registration filed under KRS 315.136 if the applicant:
Submits an incomplete application;
Fails to submit the application fee; or
Violates or is deemed to be in violation of any of the provisions of KRS 315.121.

After denying an application for registration, the board shall set the matter for a hearing in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B, upon the written request of the applicant. The applicant's request shall be submitted to the board no later than thirty (30) days immediately following the date the letter of denial is postmarked.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2008.
